pkgmetadata.longdescription: Small Area Estimation using Empirical Bayes without Auxiliary Variable // Estimates the parameter of small area in binary data without auxiliary variable using Empirical Bayes technique, mainly from Rao and Molina (2015,ISBN:9781118735787) with book entitled "Small Area Estimation Second Edition". This package provides another option of direct estimation using weight. This package also features alpha and beta parameter estimation on calculating process of small area. Those methods are Newton-Raphson and Moment which based on Wilcox (1979) doi:10.1177/001316447903900302 and Kleinman (1973) doi:10.1080/01621459.1973.10481332.
